title: The Brothers Rico [1957] Dir. Phil Karlson Starring Richard Conte, Dianne Foster, Kathryn Grant

sources.title: The Brothers Rico [1957] Dir. Phil Karlson Starring Richard Conte, Dianne Foster, Kathryn Grant
sources.description: The Brothers Rico is a 1957 American Film Noir directed by Phil Karlson and starring Richard Conte, Dianne Foster and Kathryn Grant. You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and Film Nolr of the Week . You can see a short clip of Martin Scorsese talking about the film here . It can be viewed as an introduction to the film without spoiling the plot.Â
